parameters.name: InternalWSs
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| take 1
| parse IncidentUrl with * "/workspaces/" Workspace "/" *
| project Workspace

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| distinct subscriptionId, location
| summarize by value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)
| order by value asc

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.operationsmanagement/solutions' | where name contains 'SecurityInsights' 
| parse name with "SecurityInsights(" label ")" 
| project id = tostring(properties.workspaceResourceId), label, selected = iff(label =~ '{InternalWSs}', true, false)

content.json: The charts below illustrate the status of analytics rule run for the time range: **{TimeRange:label}** and workspace(s): **{Workspace:label}**

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where OperationName in ("Scheduled analytics rule run","NRT analytics rule run")
| summarize count() by Status, bin(TimeGenerated,1h)
content.title: Analytics rule run by Status over time

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where OperationName in ("Scheduled analytics rule run","NRT analytics rule run")
| summarize count() by Status
content.title: Analytics rule run by Status

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where OperationName in ("Scheduled analytics rule run","NRT analytics rule run")
| distinct SentinelResourceId
| count 
| extend title = "Total running Unique rule"

content.json: Review the list of unique reason(s) generated in your environment and examine analytic rule(s) with 'Failure' and 'Warning' occurence.

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where OperationName in ("Scheduled analytics rule run","NRT analytics rule run")
| summarize Count=count() by Reason, Status
content.title: Analytics health summary by Reason

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where OperationName in ("Scheduled analytics rule run","NRT analytics rule run")
| where Status in ("Failure","Warning")
| summarize RunCount=count() by SentinelResourceId, RuleName=SentinelResourceName,Status
| order by RunCount desc, Status asc
content.title: Analytics rule with Failure and Warning occurence

content.json:
The table below shows a list of rule(s) with 'Failure' and 'Warning' status (if any).
You can lookup for a specific event by using the Search field.

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where OperationName in ("Scheduled analytics rule run","NRT analytics rule run")
| where Status in ('Failure', 'Warning')
| project TimeGenerated, RuleName=SentinelResourceName, Status, Description, Reason, Type=SentinelResourceKind
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Failure and Warning event

content.json: The charts below illustrate analytic rule activity for the time range: **{TimeRange:label}** and workspace(s): **{Workspace:label}**

content.query:
_SentinelAudit()
| where SentinelResourceType =="Analytic Rule"
| summarize count() by Description, bin(TimeGenerated,1h)
content.title: Analytics rule audit by Activity over time

content.query:
_SentinelAudit()
| where SentinelResourceType =="Analytic Rule"
| summarize count() by Description
content.title: Analytics rule audit by Activity

content.json:
The table below shows a list of rule(s) with activity performed (if any).
You can lookup for a specific event by using the Search field.

content.title: Analytics rule audit by activity volume

content.json:
The line chart below is Time Brush enabled.
You can filter or narrow down the time range by 'brushing' a range of time in the chart. (To reset, click on 'reset the time range selection' icon on the top right corner of the chart).

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({RuleType})
| where Status in ({Status})
| summarize count() by Status, bin(TimeGenerated,1h)
content.title: Analytics rule run Trending over time

parameters.name: Reason
parameters.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({RuleType})
| where Status in ({Status})
| distinct Reason

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({RuleType})
| where Status in ({Status})
| where Reason in ({Reason})
| summarize count() by Status
content.title: Analytics rule run by Status
Number of unique rule by Rule type and Status

content.json:
You can filter by the Status or Reason by clicking on an item in the charts below.
To reset, click on 'clear selection' icon on the top right corner of the chart.

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({RuleType})
| where Status in ({Status})
| where Reason in ({Reason})
| summarize Unique_Reason=dcount(Reason) by Status
| extend StatusText = strcat("'",Status,"'")
content.title: Number of unique reason by Status

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({RuleType})
| where Status in ({Status})
| where Reason in ({Reason})
| summarize Occurence=count(), Unique_Rule= dcount(SentinelResourceId) by Status,Reason
| extend ReasonText = strcat("'",Reason,"'")
content.title: Unique reason by Status

content.json: ðŸ’¡ Click on a row in the grid below to drill-in further

content.query:
let Data = ( 
_SentinelHealth()
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({RuleType})
| where Status in ({Status})
| where Reason in ({Reason})
);
Data
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SentinelResourceId
| project SentinelResourceId, SentinelResourceName,Type=SentinelResourceKind, LastStatus=Status,LastStatusDateTime=TimeGenerated
| join kind= leftouter (   
Data
| where Status =="Success"
| make-series SuccessTrend = count() default =0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SentinelResourceId
) on SentinelResourceId
| project-away SentinelResourceId1, TimeGenerated
| join kind= leftouter (   
Data
| where Status =="Failure"
| make-series FailureTrend = count() default =0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}  by SentinelResourceId
) on SentinelResourceId
| project-away SentinelResourceId1, TimeGenerated
| join kind= leftouter (
Data
| where Status =="Warning"
| make-series WarningTrend = count() default =0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}  by SentinelResourceId
) on SentinelResourceId
| project-away SentinelResourceId1, TimeGenerated
| join kind= leftouter (      
Data
| where Status =="Informational"
| make-series InformationalTrend = count() default =0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SentinelResourceId
) on SentinelResourceId
| project-away SentinelResourceId1, TimeGenerated
| order by SentinelResourceName asc
| project-rename RuleName=SentinelResourceName
content.title: Analytics rule by Status and Trending

content.query:
_SentinelHealth()
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({RuleType})
| where Status in ({Status})
| where Reason in ({Reason})
| where SentinelResourceId =="{SentinelResourceId}"
| project TimeGenerated, RuleName=SentinelResourceName, Status, Type=SentinelResourceKind, Description, Reason
content.title: Health details for Analytics rule : - {RuleName}

content.json:
The bar chart below is Time Brush enabled.
You can filter or narrow down the time range by 'brushing' a range of time in the chart. (To reset, click on 'reset the time range selection' icon on the top right corner of the chart).

content.query:
_SentinelAudit()
| where SentinelResourceType =="Analytic Rule"
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({AuditRuleType})
| summarize count() by Description, bin(TimeGenerated,1h)
content.title: Analytics rule audit trending by activity

parameters.name: Description
parameters.label: Activity
parameters.query:
_SentinelAudit()
| where SentinelResourceType =="Analytic Rule"
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({AuditRuleType})
| distinct Description

parameters.name: Caller
parameters.query:
_SentinelAudit()
| where SentinelResourceType =="Analytic Rule"
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({AuditRuleType})
| where Description in ({Description})
| extend Caller= tostring(ExtendedProperties.CallerName)
| distinct Caller

parameters.name: AuditSentinelResourceId
parameters.query:
_SentinelAudit()
| where SentinelResourceType =="Analytic Rule"
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({AuditRuleType})
| where Description in ({Description})
| extend Caller= tostring(ExtendedProperties.CallerName)
| where Caller in ({Caller})
| extend SentinelResourceId = tostring(ExtendedProperties.ResourceId)
| distinct SentinelResourceId

content.json:
You can filter by Activity by clicking on an item in the chart below.
To reset, click on 'clear selection' icon on the top right corner of the chart.

content.title: Number of audit event by Activity and Rule type

content.json: ðŸ’¡ Click on a row in the grid below to drill-in further

content.query:
_SentinelAudit()
| where SentinelResourceType =="Analytic Rule"
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({AuditRuleType})
| where Description in ({Description})
| extend Caller= tostring(ExtendedProperties.CallerName)
| where Caller in ({Caller})
| extend SentinelResourceId = tostring(ExtendedProperties.ResourceId)
| where SentinelResourceId in ({AuditSentinelResourceId})
| summarize TotalEvents = count() by SentinelResourceId, RuleName=SentinelResourceName, Type=SentinelResourceKind
| extend AuditSentinelResourceIdText = strcat("'",SentinelResourceId,"'")
content.title: Audit activity by Rule name

content.query:
_SentinelAudit()
| where SentinelResourceType =="Analytic Rule"
| where SentinelResourceKind in ({AuditRuleType})
| where Description in ({Description})
| extend Caller= tostring(ExtendedProperties.CallerName)
| extend SentinelResourceId = tostring(ExtendedProperties.ResourceId)
| where SentinelResourceId in ({AuditSentinelResourceId})
| summarize TotalEvents = count() by Caller
content.title: Audit activity by Caller

content.query:
_SentinelAudit()
| where SentinelResourceType =="Analytic Rule"
| extend SentinelResourceId = tostring(ExtendedProperties.ResourceId)
| where SentinelResourceId in ({AuditSentinelResourceId})
| project TimeGenerated, SentinelResourceName, Status, Description, SentinelResourceKind, ExtendedProperties
content.title: Audit activity for rule: - {AuditSelectedRuleName}
